import React,{ useState , useEffect } from 'react' import axios from 'axios'; import List_grp from './List_grp.js' const url="http://localhost:3002" const Home=()=> { const [expics,setExpics]=useState( [ ] ) useEffect( ()=> { axios.get(url).then((res)=> setExpics(res.data) ) },[]) return(<>

EXPLOSION BOX

SCRAP BOOKS GREETING CARDS POP UP BOXES WALL DECORS {/* 1st ROW */}
{ expics.map((edata,index)=> { return(<>
{edata.name}

{edata.features}

{edata.buy}
) }) }
{/* 1st ROW */}
) } export default Home
